Trade/Device Name(s): Oral Fluid DAT Control Set A
Oral Fluid DAT SQ Cal A
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Kinetic interaction of microparticles in solution (KIMS)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for DAT Oral Fluid Methamphetamine Assay using KIMS technology for qualitative and semi-quantitative detection of methamphetamine in oral fluid.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test for qualitative and semi-quantitative detection of methamphetamine in human oral fluid at 120 ng/mL cutoff, specimens collected exclusively with Intercept Oral Specimen Collection Device; used as preliminary screen with confirmatory testing by methods such as LC/MS/MS.
